summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, dated June 30, 2020, transmitting a revised draft application related to GPS monitoring for Ghislaine Maxwell. It indicates ongoing legal proceedings and pre-trial preparations in the Maxwell case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of a revised GPS monitoring application, indicating she is a defendant in an ongoing legal case in the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Transmission of Revised GPS Application for Maxwell
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends a revised draft application for GPS monitoring related to Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email dated June 30, 2020, concerning Ghislaine Maxwell.
It transmits a revised draft application for GPS monitoring, indicating pre-trial supervision or bail conditions were being negotiated or enforced.
The correspondence originates from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, showing active federal prosecution.
The attachment is named 'Revised_Applicationfor Maxwell_GPS_Combo_v2.docx', suggesting iterative legal filings.
